titleStmt.title: The petition, and narrative of Geo. Wither Esq; concerning his many grievances and long sufferings; with a preceding addresse made to the Honourable Members of Parliament in their single capacities, to incline them to a speedy consideration of his case in Parliament. Hodie nobis, cras vobis.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
